item.title: Hugo static site generator - Installation under WindowsÂ® and basic usage
item.description: Static site generators (SSG) has gain lot of attention recently because of simple process of creating and managing websites. Websites created by static site generators are blazing fast and usually loads within seconds! No matter it’s a personal blog or a professional website, SSG got it covered.A static site generator is generally a set of tools to build static HTML websites based on templates and raw data. Nowadays it has become a popular alternative to traditional CMS (i.
